Review Submission (CRUD Operations) - Users can create, update, and delete their own reviews. - Each review must have: - Product Name - Review Text - Users can rate products (1-5 stars) alongside reviews - Automatic Sentiment Analysis Result (Positive, Negative, Neutral) - Reviews will be stored in the database with their calculated sentiment. - Use AJAX for submitting reviews without refreshing the page.

4. Dashboard with Sentiment Reports - An Admin Panel to: - View all user reviews. - Admin can add products for the user to see. (Product Name, Description, Image, etc) - Admin can also add users and administrator (Show also when is there last login) - See the overall sentiment distribution (charts using Chart.js or any other javascript library for charts). - Filter reviews by sentiment type (Positive/Negative/Neutral) (You can use dataTables). - Product Management – Admin can add/edit/delete products for review. - Search & Filter – Users can search for specific reviews by product name. - Export Data – Admin can export sentiment data as CSV.
- A Graphical Report must be displayed to show trends.

Product Requirements: 1. User Authentication (Login & Registration) - Users must register with: - First Name - Last Name - Email (Unique) - Password (With confirmation & hashing) - Confirm Password - Users must be able to log in and log out securely. - User can forgot password/change password. - Only logged-in users can submit reviews.

3. Sentiment Analysis (Lexicon-Based) - The system must use a text file lexicon (provided) to determine sentiment.
- Steps for sentiment analysis: - Read the lexicon file (list of positive & negative words). - Tokenize (split) the review into words. - Count how many positive and negative words are in the review. - If positive words > negative words → Positive If negative words > positive words → Negative If equal → Neutral
Formula: Percentage= (Total Words Checked / Count of Sentiment​) × 100
- Save the sentiment result in the database. - The lexicon file should be editable so new words can be added.
